ygData.subject: Re: fun time
ygData.msgSnippet: It wasn t meant to be smart. It was more for the effect of her getting away from a bot much bigger than her. Oh well, never mind. It didn t work anyway.

It wasn't meant to be smart. It was more for the effect of her 
getting away from a bot much bigger than her. Oh well, never mind. It 
didn't work anyway.

Squizzy::

She felt the jolt of the stun gun fire just before passing out from 
it.


--- In nbwrpg@egroups.com, Yanshosh@a... wrote:
> Now how smart is it to bite a 45 foot tall bot's hand?
> 
> ::Oblitertron::
> 
> Oblitertron feels a small jolt of pain in his fingers as Squizzy 
> bites him, the gestalt growling. He looks over at DevilDuer.
> 
> "Can you calm her down?" the bot asks, lowering his hand so that 
> Squizzy was about 10 feet away from DevilDuer. DevilDuer nods, 
firing 
> his stun gun at her.
> 
> "There ya go," DevilDuer says, turning back to fire at Arcangel.
> 
> 
> --- In nbwrpg@egroups.com, logomorph@h... wrote:
> > Squizzy::
> > 
> > She struggled, "LET ME GO! PUT ME DOWN!" She gringed as his hand 
> > rubbed against the burnt skin and stung.  She still tried to get 
> > free. She shook her head and wished she had a weapon.  She bit 
down 
> > on his hand as hard as she could, she didn't have a weapon, but 
she 
> > still had her strong, sharp teeth.
> >
